title: Graceway Gourmet
description: Large food store and delicatessen carries brand names such as Boca, Amy's, Tofutti, Tofurky, Ian's, Follow Your Heart and Melissa's for vegans and vegetarians. In addition, there is hummus, a fresh salad bar, juice bar, pizza, veggie burgers, baked beans, fresh and sometimes organic produce. Also a coffee and tea bar on site. Be prepared to pay 2-3 times what you pay in the US for groceries, especially the prepared vegan microwave-type foods. Near the Roundabout at Seven Stars Resort.
